graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:CommonCreateCountryInput!)
{
	commonCreateCountry (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode
		prefix
		image
		sort
		administrativeAreas
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		langId
		name
		slug
		administrativeAreaLevel1
		administrativeAreaLevel2
		administrativeAreaLevel3
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonGetCountries (query: $query)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode
		prefix
		image
		sort
		administrativeAreas
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		dataLang
		createdAt
		updatedAt
		id
		name
		slug
		administrativeAreaLevel1
		administrativeAreaLevel2
		administrativeAreaLevel3
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonFindCountry (query: $query)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode
		prefix
		image
		sort
		administrativeAreas
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		dataLang
		createdAt
		updatedAt
		id
		name
		slug
		administrativeAreaLevel1
		administrativeAreaLevel2
		administrativeAreaLevel3
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	commonFindCountryById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode
		prefix
		image
		sort
		administrativeAreas
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		dataLang
		createdAt
		updatedAt
		id
		name
		slug
		administrativeAreaLevel1
		administrativeAreaLevel2
		administrativeAreaLevel3
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	commonFindCountryById (id:$id)
	{
		id

		administrativeAreaLevel3

}

mutation ($payload:CommonUpdateCountryInput!)
{
	commonUpdateCountry (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode
		prefix
		image
		sort
		administrativeAreas
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		dataLang
		createdAt
		updatedAt
		id
		name
		slug
		administrativeAreaLevel1
		administrativeAreaLevel2
		administrativeAreaLevel3
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($id:ID!)
{
	commonDeleteCountryById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode
		prefix
		image
		sort
		administrativeAreas
		latitude
		longitude
		zoom
		dataLang
		createdAt
		updatedAt
		id
		name
		slug
		administrativeAreaLevel1
		administrativeAreaLevel2
		administrativeAreaLevel3
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

mutation ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	commonDeleteCountries (query: $query)
	{
		id
		iso3166Alpha2
		iso3166Alpha3
		iso3166Numeric
		customCode

}
